data.comment: The match is underway in Mexico City.
Ball safe as San Luis is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 1, San Luis's Matias Catalan is on target but unsuccessful.
Free kick for Pumas UNAM in the half of San Luis.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 5, Throw-in for San Luis at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
Throw-in Pumas UNAM.
Throw-in for Pumas UNAM close to the penalty box.
In the minute 7, Throw-in for San Luis in their own half.
San Luis awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a free kick to Pumas UNAM in their own half.
In the minute 9, San Luis awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a San Luis throw-in in Pumas UNAM's half.
Ball safe as San Luis is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 10, Throw-in for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
In Mexico City a free kick has been awarded the away team.
San Luis are pushing forward but Ramiro Gonzalez's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 12, Goal kick for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
San Luis will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Pumas UNAM.
Juan Vigon puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
In the minute 17, Free kick San Luis.
Corner awarded to San Luis.
Pumas UNAM awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 19, Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez awards the away team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ball goes out of play for a Pumas UNAM goal kick.
In the minute 21, Throw-in San Luis.
Throw-in for San Luis in their own half.
Free kick for San Luis in their own half.
In the minute 23, Pumas UNAM awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Mexico City.
San Luis's Matias Catalan breaks free at Estadio Olimpico Universitario. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 25, Pumas UNAM have a goal kick.
Pumas UNAM have been awarded a corner by Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez.
In the minute 27, Johan Vasquez has recovered and rejoins the match in Mexico City.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Mexico City to check on Johan Vasquez, who is grimacing with pain.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a free kick to Pumas UNAM.
Ball safe as Pumas UNAM is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 30, In Mexico City a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in for Pumas UNAM in their own half.
Throw-in Pumas UNAM.
In the minute 33, San Luis drives forward and Ramiro Gonzalez gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Pumas UNAM awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Pumas UNAM.
In the minute 35, Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Pumas UNAM in the half of San Luis.
Attention is being given to San Luisâ€™s Ramiro Gonzalez and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 39, It seems as if Ramiro Gonzalez is unable to continue. Dionicio Escalante replaces him for the away team.
Throw-in for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
Pumas UNAM to take a throw-in in San Luis territory.
In the minute 42, Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a free kick to Pumas UNAM.
The 1st half is prolonged by 1 minutes of added time.
In Mexico City San Luis attack through German Berterame. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 45, Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez awards Pumas UNAM a goal kick.
The first-half has come to a close in Mexico City.
The second-half is now underway.
In the minute 46, Throw-in for San Luis at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
Free kick for San Luis in their own half.
Can Pumas UNAM get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in San Luis's half?
In the minute 47, Ball safe as San Luis is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for San Luis in their own half.
In the minute 48, Throw-in for San Luis in the half of Pumas UNAM.
The away team replace Enrique Lopez with Anderson Julio.
Throw-in for San Luis in the half of Pumas UNAM.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a Pumas UNAM throw-in in San Luis's half.
In the minute 50, San Luis pushes forward through Pablo Barrera, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to San Luis.
In Mexico City, Matias Catalan of San Luis is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 51, San Luis's Juan Castro gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
Throw-in San Luis.
In the minute 52, Free kick for San Luis in the half of Pumas UNAM.
Anderson Julio gets his shot on target but fails to score for San Luis.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a free kick to Pumas UNAM in their own half.
In the minute 54, Great finish from Juan Dinenno to give Pumas UNAM a 2-0 lead.
San Luis awarded a free kick in their own half.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a free kick to San Luis.
In the minute 57, San Luis have a goal kick.
Diego Pineda is on a sub for Anderson Julio for San Luis.
San Luis's Rodrigo Noya has run offside.
In the minute 60, San Luis have a dangerous throw-in.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a free kick to Pumas UNAM in their own half.
Andres Iniestra of Pumas UNAM smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 62, Can San Luis get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pumas UNAM's half?
Pumas UNAM to take a throw-in in San Luis territory.
Erik Lira is replacing Leonel Lopez for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
In the minute 64, Free kick for San Luis in their own half.
Free kick San Luis.
Matias Catalan's header is off-target for San Luis.
In the minute 65, Ball goes out of play for a Pumas UNAM goal kick.
In Mexico City a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Jorge Sanchez is replacing Pablo Lopez for the away team.
In the minute 69, Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez awards the home team a throw-in.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a free kick to Pumas UNAM in their own half.
In Mexico City a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 71, Andres Lillini (Pumas UNAM) is making a second substitution, with Bryan Mendoza replacing Juan Vigon.
Pumas UNAM have been awarded a corner by Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez.
Free kick for San Luis in their own half.
Pumas UNAM awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 73, Alejandro Mayorga for Pumas UNAM has been booked by Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez and receives a first yellow card.
Free kick Pumas UNAM.
In the minute 75, Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a free kick to San Luis.
San Luis are coming forward and Pablo Barrera gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez awards Pumas UNAM a goal kick.
In the minute 77, Throw-in for San Luis at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
Ball safe as San Luis is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 79, San Luis's Pablo Barrera misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Mexico City.
Free kick for San Luis in the half of Pumas UNAM.
In the minute 81, Throw-in Pumas UNAM.
Pumas UNAM awarded a free kick in their own half.
Andres Lillini is making the team's fourth substitution at Estadio Olimpico Universitario with Facundo Waller replacing Carlos Gutierrez.
In the minute 83, The home team have replaced Andres Iniestra with Amaury Garcia Moreno. This is the third substitution made today by Andres Lillini.
Pumas UNAM's Andres Iniestra gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Olimpico Universitario. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Pumas UNAM have been awarded a corner by Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez.
In the minute 84, It's now 3-0 thanks to an own goal from Mauro Quiroga.
Free kick for San Luis in their own half.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a free kick to Pumas UNAM in their own half.
In the minute 88, Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a Pumas UNAM throw-in in San Luis's half.
Goal kick for San Luis at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez awards Pumas UNAM a goal kick.
In the minute 89, San Luis awarded a free kick in their own half.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a free kick to San Luis.
Pumas UNAM awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for San Luis in the half of Pumas UNAM.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a free kick to Pumas UNAM in their own half.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Mexico City.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez awards the away team a throw-in.
The match has come to a close in Mexico City. The final score is 3-0.
